articles.title: California bill aims to ban sale of popular candies containing ingredients that may cause health issues - East Idaho News
articles.description: (CNN) — Some chemicals linked to health issues have been banned in food products in the European Union, while the United States has allowed use at levels determined safe. A bill recently introduced in the California State Assembly could start to change that. …
